job_description.purpose: To analyze data, generate actionable insights, and support decision-making processes for the organization.
key_responsibilities: Collect and preprocess data from various sources
Develop dashboards and reports using BI tools
Conduct statistical analyses and predictive modeling
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify business needs

kpi_objectives.metric: Percentage of error-free data in final reports
kpi_objectives.performance_summary: Needs significant improvement in data validation steps.

kpi_objectives.metric: Average turnaround time for report generation
kpi_objectives.performance_summary: Frequently misses deadlines; requires workflow optimization.

kpi_objectives.metric: User satisfaction score from dashboard users
kpi_objectives.performance_summary: Slightly below expectations; improve interactivity and usability.

kpi_objectives.metric: Number of completed projects per quarter
kpi_objectives.performance_summary: Fell short of target; better time management needed.
Collaboration is adequate but could improve.
Below expectations; prioritize completing training programs.

kpi_objectives.metric: New solutions or strategies implemented annually
kpi_objectives.performance_summary: No innovations implemented; encourage proactive problem-solving.
